channel.title: Quick question about wireless router/port forwarding.. [WRONG SECTION SRY]
channel.description: Ok I know I did another thread related to this recently by I didn't get any answeres and this is basically a different question...so I port forwarded my server and now I can actually login to it now, but my friend who has a wireless router can't login and he has a router....does he need to port forward too or something? :S

item.title: Quick question about wireless router/port forwarding.. [WRONG SECTION SRY]
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

I sent him the client with the IP all he has to do is run and login…
and the best I can do was to change title to get this moved…

Read full topic
